EmailTemplate.name: 2011_EMSWorldEXPO_Winner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Stopping - EMS World EXPO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Winner Announcement Thanks for Attending EMS World EXPO
Congratulations Marsha Heckler of Mario County EMS She was the lucky winner of our Apple iPad 2 drawing!
A big thanks to everyone who stopped by our booth at the recent EMS World EXPO in Las Vegas. We hope you enjoyed the show!
We get it - you have too many calls, not enough staff and too much pressure. Making sense of the future is our business. We're helping medical transportation agencies reshape the way they manage information to help them focus on what's important. Do you think your agency needs to be reshaped?
If you were unable to make it to the booth during the show, no problem. See how our ePCR (http://www.tritech.com/products/ems-solutions/fusion-epcr) and Billing (http://www.tritech.com/products/ems-solutions/sweet-billing) solutions are helping our clients reshape the way they manage information right now.
See It . Believe It. Experience It.
For more information or to speak with a representative please contact us via email sales@tritech.com or by calling 800.537.3927
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
